reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Somalia Pienase- ja ammushallinnon kehittaminen Somaliassa
Weapon and Ammunition and Management (WAM) in the Federal Republic of Somalia

description.narrative: The objective of this project is to enhance the capacity of national policymakers and relevant security authorities in the FGS in particular ONSA and the UN whom are tasked with leading or supporting the design and strengthening of a national framework rel ated to weapons and ammunition governance and management. More specifically this phase of the project endeavours to support the FGS and where appropriate the Federal Member States and UN partners in their efforts to establish accountable and transparent WA M policies and plans and to help monitor and assess?through identification of benchmarks?progress in WAM for the 2017-2020 period.

The objective of this project is to enhance the capacity of national policymakers and relevant security authorities in the FGS in particular ONSA and the UN whom are tasked with leading or supporting the design and strengthening of a national framework rel ated to weapons and ammunition governance and management. More specifically this phase of the project endeavours to support the FGS and where appropriate the Federal Member States and UN partners in their efforts to establish accountable and transparent WA M policies and plans and to help monitor and assess?through identification of benchmarks?progress in WAM for the 2017-2020 period.
